content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I assist you with plumbing, electrical, or HVAC services today?
Cheap loans! Lowest rates, apply now! Visit www.getcashfast.com!
This number appears to be used for spam messages. We cannot assist with your request. You will be marked as spam and blocked from further contact. Goodbye.
reason: Customer identified as spammer due to unsolicited loan advertising messages.
